CustomField.formula: "product/" + SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( Lower(Name), " ", "-" ), "&", "and" ), "'", "-"), ":", "-"), "," ,"-"), "+", "-"), ".", "-"), "#", "-"), "@", "-"), "~", "-"),"/", "-" ), "?", "-") + "/" + Id
CustomField.label: Detail URL
